channel.title: Whonix 15 CLI gateway stuck at dist-upgrade
channel.description:
When I try to do dist-upgrade right after installing the Whonix 15 CLI gateway, it stops at:
"Setting up linux-headers-4.19.0-6-amd64 (4.19-67-2) ..."
It then reads at maximum IO and never finishes. Even just stopping it with ctrl c doesn't work.

item.title: Whonix 15 CLI gateway stuck at dist-upgrade
item.dc:creator: rob75
item.description:
Never mind, I’m just an idiot, needed to wait long enough.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix 15 CLI gateway stuck at dist-upgrade
